lines.text: You can't bluff someone who's not paying attention.
Wait, wait, wait. What is this? What are you gonna do to me? What are you fronting off about? And if I'm this bad dude, why don't I just take out some gun, blow you to a billion parts?
I'll tell you why. Cuz I think you're just a bully.

[chuckles]
Just a bully? What, you're not gonna let me carry your books? Aren't you a caution.
Let's talk turkey, pal.
Y'know, I know there are people who are normal.
Are there?
Yes, there are. But...
But what?
But I don't know what those people do.
When you have done something unforgivable, I'll tell you exactly what to do. You forgive yourself.
It's called a confidence game. Why? Because you give me your confidence? No. Because I give you mine.
I'm from the United States of kiss-my-ass.
Oh, you're a bad pony. And I'm not gonna bet on you.
The bitch is a booster.
The bitch is a born thief, man.
So, you had her made from the jump?
I'm tellin' ya. A ton of fuckin' bricks! Show me some REAL con-men.
Yeah, we showed her some con-men.
We showed her some DINOSAUR con-men. Some old style.
Yes, sir.
Years from now, they're gonna have to go to a museum to see a frame like this.
That's right.
Took her money and screwed her, too.
A small price to pay.
You took my money.
How naughty of me.
You see, in my trade, this is called - what you did - you cracked out of turn. Huh? You see? You crumbed the play.

Hey, fuck you! This is what you always wanted, you crooked bitch! You thief! You always need to get caught, 'cos you know you're bad. I never hurt anybody, I never shot anybody. You sought this out. This is what you always wanted. I knew it the first time you came in. You're worthless, you know it? You're a whore. You came back like a dog to its own vomit You sick bitch - I'm not gonna give you shit.
You say I acted atrociously. Yes. I did. I do it for a living.
Did I ever tell you my name? My name is Mike.
Glad to meet you.
Well, I'm glad to meet you, too.
I have a proposition for you.
And what's YOUR name?
If you're fired from your job, when you're going home, take something. A pencil... Something to assert yourself. Take a memento. Take something from life.
Beg for your life, or I'm going to kill you.
I think you're bluffin', pal. I think you're trying to BUY it!
Then you're gonna have to give me some respect, or give me some money.
What'd you do, win again?
That's right. If you wanna win the hand, you've gotta stay in 'til the end.
Mike, you are the ring-tail rounder. You are King Kong.
One riot, one ranger.
You put that bitch in the panic bag.
Hey, baby, this is my road game.
What's next?
Mike, how did you know she was gonna go for it?
Go for it? Hey, the broad's an addict!

[after being shot]
Thank you, sir. May I have another?
Everybody gets something out of every transaction.
Don't trust nobody.
You're not miffed at us, are ya?
South Street Seaport, the man says. He can't stand the heat. He can't stand it.
Slam-bang on the breezoad.
[after the con has failed due to Margaret noticing water dripping from the gun]
Told you a squirt gun wouldn't work.
A squirt gun would've worked- you didn't have to fill it!
